text: Nikomu Allakh ne daroval dvukh serdets v tele, ne sdelal vashimi materyami tekh vashikh zhen, s kotorymi vy razvodites' soglasno obryadu, i ne sdelal vashikh priyemnykh synovey vashimi [krovnymi] synov'yami. [Odno delo] - eto vashi slova iz vashikh ust, Allakh zhe veshchayet [tol'ko] istinu, i On nastavlyayet na pryamoy put'
